Topic.Title: How to get my game out of the sandpit?

Posts.EditableText: My game has been completely written for about 7 or 8 months now. How do I get it out of the sandpit?
Posts.HTML: My game has been completely written for about 7 or 8 months now. How do I get it out of the sandpit?

Posts.EditableText: Go to edit your listing and you can resubmit it to a category from there.
Posts.HTML: Go to edit your listing and you can resubmit it to a category from there.
